strings:
<se_low>Yangus: I was sure this place was a jail or somefin'
when I saw them bars on the door.
Looks like I couldn't be more wrong, eh!?
<se_low>Yangus: It's got me stumped, though. Judging by the decor, it def'nitely ain't no item or weapon shop. But it don't look like a pub neither...
<se_low>Yangus: It ain't like any puff-puff parlour I ever 'eard of, but it's still pretty dodgy if you ask me.
<se_low>Yangus: It's the blindfold wot does it. It's funny wot 'avin' your eyes covered does to yer 'magination!

<se_high>Jessica: I wonder if these people are really monsters?
You know, wearing human disguises?
<se_high>Jessica: Ha ha ha! Just kidding!
<se_high>Jessica: I've never met anyone with such a fine pair!
<se_high>Jessica: I'd kill to have a pair like them!
<se_def>Angelo: The tough guy behind the counter...and the seedy decor... They can only mean one thing!
<se_def>Angelo: This must be the famous puff-puff bar!
<se_def>Angelo: Mmmmm... I can think of worse things than spending the rest of my days here enjoying the simple delights of a good puff-puff!

<se_low>Yangus: I was sure this place was a jail or somefin'
when I saw them bars on the door.
Looks like I couldn't be more wrong, eh!?
<se_low>Yangus: It's got me stumped, though. Judging by the decor, it def'nitely ain't no item or weapon shop. But it don't look like a pub neither...
<se_low>Yangus: It ain't like any puff-puff parlour I ever 'eard of, but it's still pretty dodgy if you ask me.
<se_low>Yangus: It's the blindfold wot does it. It's funny wot 'avin' your eyes covered does to yer 'magination!

<se_high>Jessica: I wonder if these people are really monsters?
You know, wearing human disguises?
<se_high>Jessica: Ha ha ha! Just kidding!
<se_high>Jessica: I've never met anyone with such a fine pair!
<se_high>Jessica: I'd kill to have a pair like them!
<se_def>Angelo: The tough guy behind the counter...and the seedy decor... They can only mean one thing!
<se_def>Angelo: This must be the famous puff-puff bar!
<se_def>Angelo: I've got it! Let's put Rhapthorne on hold for a little while, and spend the whole day taking it in turns getting puff-puffed!
<se_def>Angelo: It makes sense. Rhapthorne's really strong, so if we don't re-energise our minds and bodies before we take him on, we're bound to lose.

<se_def>Angelo: Puff-puffs are the perfect solution!
Nay, the key to our success!<page>Angelo: Come on guys! It's things like puff-puffs we're fighting to save! Are you with me!?

<se_high>Red: Wot's this place all about? It's givin' me the willies. ...Tsk, I dunno why I'm tellin' you.
You ain't gonna get it.

<se_high>Red: Feelin' refreshed, are ya, <hero>?
Tsk, men! Yer all the same.
Ya do know they're not real, don't ya?
<se_low>Morrie: Che!? This place...! Si, this is the legendary puff-puff club! ...Va bene, you must never say about this to Marrie and my other girls, capice?
<se_low>Morrie: Ah ha ha! Si, perfetto! The puff-puff gives to me new POWER and new PASSION!
<se_low>Morrie: They feel as soft and squishing as the little slime monsters, ay?
